data.trans: Tài hoa, kĩ năng thành thục
data.trans_hint: Mẹ cô ấy là một nhạc công piano tài năng.
data.en_hint: Her mother is an accomplished pianist.
data.content_game_1: Her mother is an accomplished pianist.
data.answer_en_hint: Her mother is an accomplished pianist.

data.trans_hint: Mẹ của tôi thích những đồ nội thất bắt mắt (có thẩm mỹ).
data.en_hint: My mother prefers furniture that is aesthetic.
data.content_game_1: My mother prefers furniture that is aesthetic.
data.answer_en_hint: My mother prefers furniture that is aesthetic.

data.trans_hint: Nền kinh tế của đất nước được lợi từ ngành du lịch đang phát triển.
data.en_hint: The country's economy benefits from its burgeoning tourist industry.
data.content_game_1: The country's economy benefits from its burgeoning tourist industry.
data.answer_en_hint: The country's economy benefits from its burgeoning tourist industry.

data.trans_hint: Con gái của tôi rất yêu thích nhạc cổ điển.
data.content_game_1: My daughter loves classical music.
data.answer_en_hint: My daughter loves classical music.

data.trans_hint: Tôi nghĩ đó là một ý tưởng rất sáng tạo.
data.en_hint: I think that's a very creative idea.
data.content_game_1: I think that's a very creative idea.
data.answer_en_hint: I think that's a very creative idea.

data.trans_hint: Tôi nghĩ bạn nên tôn trọng bản sắc văn hóa cùa các quốc gia khác như truyền thống và phong tục của họ.
data.en_hint: I think you should respect other countries' cultural identities like tradititions and customs.
data.content_game_1: I think you should respect other countries' cultural identities like tradititions and customs.
data.answer_en_hint: I think you should respect other countries' cultural identities like tradititions and customs.

data.trans: Làm xao lãng, gây lạc hướng
data.trans_hint: Thứ âm nhạc dở tệ từ hàng xóm làm tôi sao lãng.
data.en_hint: The lousy music from the neighborhood is very distracting.
data.content_game_1: The lousy music from the neighborhood is very distracting.
data.answer_en_hint: The lousy music from the neighborhood is very distracting.

data.trans: Chiết trung, trung hòa, đa dạng
data.trans_hint: Cô ấy có một thị hiếu văn học trung hòa đa dạng.
data.en_hint: She has an eclectic taste in literature.
data.content_game_1: She has an eclectic taste in literature.
data.answer_en_hint: She has an eclectic taste in literature.

data.trans_hint: Anh ấy luôn luôn có những màn trình diễn sôi động.
data.content_game_1: He always gives electric performances.
data.answer_en_hint: He always gives electric performances.

data.trans_hint: Cô ấy đã có một bài phát biểu đầy cảm xúc khi nhận giải.
data.en_hint: She gave an emotional speech upon receiving the award.
data.content_game_1: She gave an emotional speech upon receiving the award.
data.answer_en_hint: She gave an emotional speech upon receiving the award.
